summary: 2 security issues fixed, 0 new issues found

round1_verification.evidence: PID file mechanism completely removed. Run tracking now uses in-memory dict '_active_runs' (line 43). No os.kill(), no /tmp/ paths, no file-based locking. TOCTOU vulnerability eliminated.
All print() statements removed from intercom_client.py. Code now uses logger.debug/info/warning/error consistently. Grep confirms zero print() calls in both files.

round1_verification.note: Out of scope - rate limiting typically handled at API gateway layer per project architecture
Existing pattern with whitelist protection (_ALLOWED_PHASE_FIELDS), not introduced by this PR
Existing validation issue, not introduced by this PR
